1function [F, snr, w] = measureFreqXcorr(s, analizeTime, Fs) %#codegen
 2w = fft(single(s), analizeTime);
 3sh = ifft(abs(w).^2);
 4i = 2;
 5while sh(i) < sh(i-1)
 6    i = i + 1;
 7end
 8sh(1:i) = 0;
 9[M,p] = max(sh(1:1100));
10
11if p < 4
12    p = 4;
13elseif p > analizeTime-3
14    p = analizeTime-3;
15end
16
17idx = p+(-3:3);
18
19PP = polyfit(idx, sh(idx), 2);
20PZ = PP(2)/2/PP(1);
21% PD = polyder(PP);
22% PZ = roots(PD);
23F = real(Fs/(PZ+1));
24snr = real(M);
